page.title: 20Modern Technology,Rufforth
page.content: In Rufforth there are {2781 items} of Modern Technology. When split into categories there are {1161 items}for the{Kitchen,185 items}for the{ {Garden,952 items}for the{Living room, {159 items}for the {Bedroom,302 items for the{Bathroom }and{22 Burglar {Alarms. Every body}has an{Electric {Iron.}The most unpopular item is a {Sun Bed.}Nearly every body has a {Refrigerator. 61 people}have{ {Cassette Players.}Most of the people have{telephones. Not many people}have {Computors.}The items that are just coming in are{Dish washers}and {Microwave ovens.19 people}have{ {Dishwashers}and{33 people}have{ {Microwave Ovens. These pages have been prepared by the children of{Rufforth County Primary {School}and edited by their teacher Mrs. D.S.Murfin.
